title: Let battle commence
brief_description: The history of the making of a cartoon by the amateur Grasshopper Group - a number of people interested in animation. Covers all aspects of the project from the initial idea, through to the finished cartoon, “The Battle of Wangapore”, which is then shown in its entirety. (See also Title Code 001057 “The Battle of Wangapore”).
